ideas.title: Trambled Dreams
ideas.premise: A tiny tram, packed with people, derails because it tried to navigate the proposed new infrastructure project (a spaghetti junction).
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne's trams and complicated infrastructure plans are relatable and visually comical.

ideas.title: Weather App-pocalypse
ideas.premise: A bewildered Melburnian stares at their phone showing a clear sky, while simultaneously being drenched in sideways rain.
ideas.why_funny: Satirizes Melbourne's notoriously unpredictable weather and reliance on weather apps.

ideas.title: The Footy Gods
ideas.premise: Zeus and other Greek gods are in the clouds, rigging the Aussie Rules football game for a Melbourne team to win.
ideas.why_funny: Combines Greek mythology with Melbourne's footy obsession for absurd humor.

ideas.title: Sausage Sizzle Stampede
ideas.premise: An overhead shot of a park, with thousands stampeding towards a community event solely for the promise of a free sausage sizzle.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerates the Australian love for a free sausage sizzle at any community event.

ideas.title: Barista Expansion
ideas.premise: A local cafe announces its expansion, literally annexing the neighboring building by chaining it up and installing an espresso machine in the window.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at Melbourne's coffee culture and aggressive business expansion.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.title: Melbourne sports team advances in regional championship
headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title
